summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating design, construction, maintenance, use and occupancy of buildings, and amending Sections 104, 413, 420, 504, 510, 1001, 1002, 1003, 1102, 1110, 1204, 1705, 1807, 1907, 2007, 2107, 2201, 2205, 3303, 3304, 3305, 3308, 3309, 3311, 3322, 3503, 3601, 3706, 3707, 3708, 4303, 4305, 5004, 5103, 5303, 5403, 5405 and 5508 of the Building Code (Ordinance 85500).
